channel.title: How do I sideload the Ledger Radix app onto my Ledger Nano S?
channel.description:
There are detailed instructions on how to sideload on the official Radix Docs site here:
* [Sideloading the Radix Ledger Nano App onto Ledger Nano S](https://docs.radixdlt.com/main/user-applications/ledger-app-sideload.html)
## YouTube
